paramInformation.label: Status after power failure
paramInformation.description: Define how the RGB BULB will react after the power supply is back on.

paramInformation.description: RGB BULB can send notifications to associated device

options.label: Send BASIC REPORT only without status change

paramInformation.label: Enable/disable the function of using wall switch to turn on/off RGB BULB
Advance mode
paramInformation.description: RGB BULB can blink or cyclic/random change color automatically at set intervals.

options.label: Color change randomly with a breathing blink
Breathing blink with a specific color

paramInformation.label: Resetting to factory default
paramInformation.description: RGB BULB will exclude from the Z-Wave network with this particular command
